## Source: ossf-package-analysis (7e27682d3c0d71a71640f7d7830be4cd2125402e0509403333eb45413256f63c)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'barcodeqrgen' @ 1.0.3 (pypi) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:
- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.
